flavorText: Emrakul has not been seen in months. Though her brood's numbers have dwindled in her absence, each drone is still a deadly threat.

foreignData.flavorText: Emrakul wurde seit Monaten nicht gesehen. Doch auch wenn seine Bruten in seiner Abwesenheit weniger geworden sind, so bleibt doch jede einzelne Drohne eine tödliche Bedrohung.
foreignData.name: Abkömmling von Emrakul
foreignData.text: Fahl (Diese Karte hat keine Farbe.)Verursacht Trampelschaden

foreignData.flavorText: Hace meses que nadie ve a Emrakul. Aunque las filas de su especie han mermado desde su ausencia, cada zángano sigue siendo una amenaza letal.
foreignData.name: Vestigio de Emrakul
foreignData.text: Vacío. (Esta carta no tiene ningún color.)Arrolla.

foreignData.flavorText: Cela fait des mois que personne n'a vu Emrakul. Sa progéniture a beau avoir décliné en son absence, chaque drone représente toujours une menace mortelle.
foreignData.name: Vestige d'Emrakul
foreignData.text: Carence (Cette carte n'a pas de couleur.)Piétinement

foreignData.flavorText: Sono passati mesi dall'ultimo avvistamento di Emrakul. Anche se le file della sua covata si sono assottigliate in sua assenza, ogni parassita costituisce ancora una minaccia mortale.
foreignData.name: Vestigio di Emrakul

foreignData.flavorText: エムラクールは何ヶ月も目撃されていない。その間に血統の数は減ったが、ドローンがいまだ脅威であることに変わりはない。
foreignData.name: エムラクールの名残
foreignData.text: 欠色（このカードは無色である。）トランプル
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — エルドラージ・ドローン

foreignData.flavorText: 엠라쿨이 지난 몇 달간 보이지 않았다. 엠라쿨이 자리를 비운 사이 그녀의 새끼들 수는 줄었지만, 드론들은 여전히 매우 위협적인 존재이다.
foreignData.name: 엠라쿨의 잔재

foreignData.flavorText: Emrakul não é vista há meses. Embora sua linhagem tenha diminuído em número em sua ausência, cada zangão ainda é uma ameaça mortal.
foreignData.name: Vestígio de Emrakul

foreignData.flavorText: Эмракул не видели уже много месяцев. За это время численность ее выводка сократилась, но каждый дрон все еще несет смертельную опасность.
foreignData.name: Частица Эмракул
foreignData.text: Лишение (У этой карты нет цвета.)Пробивной удар

foreignData.flavorText: 伊莫库已有多月未现身。虽然她孳生的巢群数量在日渐减少，但每一个奴兽都是致命的威胁。
foreignData.name: 伊莫库残肢
foreignData.text: 虚色（此牌没有颜色。）践踏

foreignData.flavorText: 伊莫庫已有數月未現身。雖然她孳生的巢群數量在日漸減少，但每一個奴獸都是致命的威脅。
foreignData.name: 伊莫庫殘肢
foreignData.text: 虛色（此牌沒有顏色。）踐踏

name: Vestige of Emrakul
originalText:
Devoid (This card has no color.)
Trample

rulings.text: Cards with devoid use frames that are variations of the transparent frame traditionally used for Eldrazi. The top part of the card features some color over a background based on the texture of the hedrons that once imprisoned the Eldrazi. This coloration is intended to aid deckbuilding and game play.
A card with devoid is just colorless. It’s not colorless and the colors of mana in its mana cost.
Other cards and abilities can give a card with devoid color. If that happens, it’s just the new color, not that color and colorless.
Devoid works in all zones, not just on the battlefield.
If a card loses devoid, it will still be colorless. This is because effects that change an object’s color (like the one created by devoid) are considered before the object loses devoid.

text:
